revision.text:
[[GZDoom]] supports many different formats for various types of data: * [[Archive format]]s * [[Font format]]s * [[Image format]]s * [[Video format]]s * [[Map format]]s * [[Model format]]s {{OpenGLsmall}} * [[Music format]]s * [[Sound format]]s * [[Voxel format]]s
== External links == * [[multimedia:Main Page|Multimedia Wiki]] documents several image, video, sound and music formats listed here. * [[vgmpf:Main Page|Videogame Music Preservation Foundation Wiki]] documents several sound and music formats. Particularly the emulated music formats supported by GZDoom. [[Category:Data formats|*]][[Category:Technical aspects]]
